name: Alex Basics Final Mission: Burn down his house and get out
name_original: Alex Basics Final Mission: Burn down his house and get out
description:
Alex Basics Final Mission: Burn down his house and get out is a game developed by Lemon Baldi 666. It was originally released in 2020.
Alex Basics Final Mission: Burn down his house and get out is available on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
